verbs.description: " Mark Goepper ? [ARG2: Where] [V: 's] [ARG1: Mark] ? " Trump said , calling Goepper by the wrong first name and mispronouncing his last name .
[ARG1: " Mark Goepper ? Where 's Mark ?] " [ARG0: Trump] [V: said] , [ARGM-PRD: calling Goepper by the wrong first name and mispronouncing his last name] .
" Mark Goepper ? Where 's Mark ? " [ARG0: Trump] said , [V: calling] [ARG1: Goepper] [ARG2: by the wrong first name] and mispronouncing his last name .
" Mark Goepper ? Where 's Mark ? " [ARG0: Trump] said , calling Goepper by the wrong first name and [V: mispronouncing] [ARG1: his last name] .
